## UseConnectToOptions.xform property

A function that will transform each environment before it is merged

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
xform?: (e: Environment) => Environment;
```

## Remarks

See [renameEnvVars()](./cloud.renameenvvars.md) as a function that is useful as an `xform` option.
